page.title: 06My Family Life
page.content:
This is a list of all the people in my family that I can think of. Aunty Pat, Paula and Margaret. Uncle Tom, Frank and Graham. Great uncle Fred. Mum, Dad Emma(sister). Cousin Christopher, Kate, Brian and Jackie and Grandma. I have got two pets one is a harliquin rabbit, the other is a cat called Tiger. My mum is called Joan, and she is a nurse who works at Shenstone Surgery. My dad's name is Peter and he is a plumber. My sister is called Emma she is in the second year of King Edward's School Lichfield. We have got a shed down our garden, and on sunday 30th of June me and Jane Alexander were in the shed. I went up to the house on my way up, Brian Fisher threw a stone as big as an egg, and it hit me on the head.
POLLY ANNA HARRISON
